snippet: The officer’s injury was not life-threatening, the department said, and the gunman was being sought.
abstract: New York City police sergeant is shot in the leg on a Queens street; injuries are not life threatening and the gunman is being sought.

byline.original: By MICHAEL SCHWIRTZ and CHRISTOPHER MAAG

lead_paragraph: The officer’s injury was not life-threatening, the department said, and the gunman was being sought.

headline.seo: Police Sergeant Is Shot in the Leg in Queens
headline.main: Police Sergeant Shot in the Leg in Queens
headline.print_headline: Police Officer Shot in the Leg in Queens
